          <title>
            <string language="en">Glucose - the building block of other molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glukose - der Baustein anderer Moleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Glucose - le module d'autres molécules</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows glucose as the basic component of some substances found in plants.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le glucose comme le composant
